name: Leap Second
description:
Use Time Travel to make your way through your lab and stop the reactor from melting down. You only have a few seconds left, but with time at your fingertips, you've got all the time in the world...

Controls:

Space to jump
WASD to move
E to interact
Q to open the time travel menu
Esc to pause

Made by:

Theishiopian - Time Traveler, Code Wizard
Gstaffen - Artist, Animator, Puzzle Crafter

Assets used: universal sound pack by Imprehzi, free sci-fi music by N91
